mapper.insert: insert into product_sku(sku_code, sku_name, product_id, thumb_img, sale_price, market_price, cost_price, stock_num, sale_num, sku_spec, weight, volume, status) values (#{skuCode}, #{ skuName}, #{ productId}, #{ thumbImg}, #{ salePrice}, #{ marketPrice}, #{ costPrice}, #{ stockNum}, #{ saleNum}, #{ skuSpec}, #{ weight}, #{volume}, #{status})
mapper.update:
update product_sku
skuCode = #{skuCode},
skuName = #{ skuName},
productId = #{ productId},
thumbImg = #{ thumbImg},
salePrice = #{ salePrice},
marketPrice = #{ marketPrice},
costPrice = #{ costPrice},
stockNum = #{ stockNum},
saleNum = #{ saleNum},
skuSpec = #{ skuSpec},
weight = #{ weight},
volume = #{volume},
status = #{status},
where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, sku_code, sku_name, product_id, thumb_img, sale_price, market_price, cost_price, stock_num, sale_num, sku_spec, weight, volume, status, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from product_sku

select id, sku_code, sku_name, product_id, thumb_img, sale_price, market_price, cost_price, stock_num, sale_num, sku_spec, weight, volume, status, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from product_sku where product_id = #{productId} and is_deleted = 0 order by id desc
